org.livingdoc.converters.number

Class AbstractNumberConverter<T extends Number>

  • org.livingdoc.converters.number.AbstractNumberConverter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TypeConverter<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BigDecimalConverter, BigIntegerConverter, ByteConverter, DoubleConverter, FloatConverter, IntegerConverter, LongConverter, ShortConverter

    public class AbstractNumberConverter<T extends Number>
implements TypeConverter<T>

    The AbstractNumberConverter is the abstraction of the numeric converters.

        The AbstractNumberConverter is the abstraction of the numeric converters.
